label: WorkExperience
title: Engineering Product Specialist
description: Worked as a mechanical engineer focusing on hydraulic fracturing machines, and implementing SolidWorks PDM for company use
keyPoints: Used SolidWorks to create 3D models of designs, and create drawings
Designed basic hydraulic systems and created layout drawings
Develop calculation sheets for ASME B31.3 Process piping specifications
Simulated critical designs used Solidworks FEA analysis, prepared reports documenting findings

label: WorkExperience
title: Engineering Summer Student
description: Worked under full-time engineers performing changes to current designs and creating new designs
keyPoints: Supported production teams in large output manufacturing and assembly processes
Implemented changes compliant with Engineering Change Request procedures
Determined root cause of issues via system and design analysis

label: WorkExperience
title: Engineering and Utilities Summer Student
description: Worked for the village completing tasks primarily related to water usage and billing
keyPoints: Compiled data on water usage, compliance and billing requirements
Mapped village assets and performed analysis on asset lifetimes

label: WorkExperience
title: Plumbing Labourer (Summer Position)

Installed copper, ABS, PVC, Pex and cast-iron piping

label: WorkExperience
title: Team Captain
